            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民日报钟声：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%93%AC%E4%BD%A9%E5%A5%A5%E7%9A%84%E6%8B%99%E5%8A%A3%E8%A1%A8%E6%BC%94%E8%BF%98%E8%A6%81%E6%8C%81%E7%BB%AD%E5%A4%9A%E4%B9%85%23&amp;from=default">#蓬佩奥的拙劣表演还要持续多久#</a>？】编造病毒是“武汉实验室泄漏”，鼓动“索赔追责”，炒作所谓的“中国数据失实”……然而，蓬佩奥的拙劣表演，毕竟不是一场游戏那么简单。美国头号外交官谎言连篇，恶语伤人，对于当前国际抗疫合作的危害之深不言自明。尽早停止给全球团结制造麻烦、 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFFwmCwMA" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499310589182484:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499310589182484&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%87103%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠病毒感染病例超过103万#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学发布的全球新冠肺炎数据实时统计系统，截至美国东部时间4月29日晚6时，全美共报告新冠肺炎确诊1036652例，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%856%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠死亡病例超6万例#</a>。过去24小时，美国新增确诊25935例，新增死亡2110例。（张梦旭） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4499181232251009&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2803301701%26mid%3D4499181232251009&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>
                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>

                                <span class="hover">

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4499181232251009" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFC9J9rAB?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 22:50" date="1588171859000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4499181232251009:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 22:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%BE%AE%E8%AF%84%23&amp;from=default">#人民微评#</a>：残虐孩子，人性何在？】虎毒不食子，把孩子打进重症监护室抢救，何其毒辣！孩子需要爱而不是暴力，需要呵护而不是伤害。残虐孩子须受法律严惩，更该探讨怎么才能给孩子温暖的家。当父母是有资格的，不懂得善待孩子不配当父母。期待这名可怜的4岁女童快快醒来，早日康复！                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4499029050620465" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民日报" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民日报</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F4%E5%B2%81%E5%A5%B3%E7%AB%A5%E8%A2%AB%E8%99%90%E6%89%93%E5%85%B6%E7%88%B6%E8%A2%AB%E5%88%91%E6%8B%98%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江4岁女童被虐打其父被刑拘#</a>】日前，黑龙江建三江创业农场一名4岁女童疑被其继母虐打致重伤送医。检察机关已提前介入调查。黑龙江省垦区公安局建三江分局通报，共同生活期间，父亲于某龙对于某茜管教时，也曾用手、数据线、笤帚殴打。犯罪嫌疑人曲某某、于某龙因涉嫌故意伤害罪，已被警方刑拘。 ​​​​                                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4499173237867374" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFBWPx0F8?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 22:19" date="1588169952000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4499173237867374:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 22:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：你若温和坚定，余生皆是欢喜】善意，不是高声的叫嚣，而是一种由内而外的关怀，是一种无言的力量。柔软的人，善良而不张扬，在关怀的同时能顾忌到他人自尊，懂得给人留一份体面。这种对生命的尊重是最大的善意，更是有人情味、有温度的温暖品德。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4499173237867374:1022-article:1022%3A2309404499173234835618:page_100206_home:2803301701:4499173237867374:2803301701" title="【夜读】你若温和坚定，余生皆是欢喜" href="http://t.cn/A6AUKtYu" alt="http://t.cn/A6AUKtYu" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>【夜读】你若温和坚定，余生皆是欢喜</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                <div class="WB_ani_loading" node-type="layer_loading"><svg width="100%" height="100%" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 40 40"><circle cx="20" cy="20" fill="#fff" fill-opacity="0.2" r="20"></circle><circle class="c" cx="20" cy="20" fill-opacity="0" r="19" stroke="#fff" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="120"></circle></svg></div>
            </div>
            <div class="WB_feed_spec_info SW_fun">
                <div class="WB_feed_spec_cont">
                    <h4 class="WB_feed_spec_tit W_autocut">【夜读】你若温和坚定，余生皆是欢喜</h4>
                                    </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4499167672026274" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFBNR8v7Q?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 21:57" date="1588168626000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4499167672026274:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 21:57</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E5%AE%89%E4%B8%80%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E5%BC%80%E8%AE%BE%E9%80%8F%E6%B0%94%E8%AF%BE%23&amp;from=default">#西安一小学开设透气课#</a>】近日，陕师大实验小学为学生开设了“透气课”。该校校长罗坤介绍，复课后同学们每天都戴口罩，所以每天上下午固定时间将同学们带到花园、操场等空旷场所拉开距离、自由呼吸，称为“透气课”。学生们纷纷表示，在教室戴口罩有点闷，能够这样摘口罩、透透气非常凉快，舒服多了 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFBNR8v7Q" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499167672026274:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499167672026274&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E4%B8%80%E6%95%99%E5%B8%88%E7%A7%B0%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E9%B8%A6%E7%89%87%E6%88%98%E4%BA%89%E5%B8%AE%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%A6%81%E7%83%9F%23&amp;from=default">#香港一教师称英国鸦片战争帮中国禁烟#</a>，校方称已介入处理】4月28日，来自中国香港的李女士正陪着小学二年级的孩子上网课，结果课堂内容让她深感震惊，授课老师在讲到鸦片战争居然称，战争的发起源于英国政府想要帮中国禁烟。愤怒的李女士随后向学校反应并要求对该教师进行处分，学校方面称他们已经 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFBvuB3y2" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499156288831778:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499156288831778&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4499150437943677" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFBm3xkvP?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 20:48" date="1588164517000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4499150437943677:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 20:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E4%B8%80%E5%AD%A3%E5%BA%A6%E5%AE%9E%E9%99%85GDP%E4%B8%8B%E9%99%8D4.8%EF%BC%85%23&amp;from=default">#美国一季度实际GDP下降4.8％#</a>】29日，美国商务部公布了2020年第一季度国内生产总值，数据显示，今年第一季度美国实际国内生产总值下降了4.8％，远低于前值的2.1%，这也是2009年以来最大的季度跌幅。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E4%B8%80%E5%AD%A3%E5%BA%A6GDP%E5%88%9B09%E5%B9%B4%E4%BB%A5%E6%9D%A5%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E8%B7%8C%E5%B9%85%23&amp;from=default">#美一季度GDP创09年以来最大跌幅#</a>（人民日报记者吴乐珺） ​​​​                                            </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【中共中央政治局常务委员会召开会议&nbsp;&nbsp;分析国内外新冠肺炎疫情防控形势&nbsp;&nbsp;研究部署完善常态化疫情防控举措&nbsp;&nbsp;研究确定支持湖北省经济社会发展一揽子政策&nbsp;&nbsp;中共中央总书记习近平主持会议】中共中央政治局常务委员会4月29日召开会议，分析国内外新冠肺炎疫情防控形势，研究部署完善常态化疫情防控举措，研 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFAKVmENh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499127415400031:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499127415400031&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4499120817945271" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFAAhxkVx?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 18:50" date="1588157455000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4499120817945271:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 18:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">完整版视频：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%80%BF%E7%88%BD%E4%B8%8E%E6%BE%B3%E5%AA%92%E8%AE%B0%E8%80%85%E9%97%AE%E7%AD%94%E4%BA%A4%E9%94%8B%23&amp;from=default">#耿爽与澳媒记者问答交锋#</a>】4月28日，外交部记者会上，有澳媒记者提问称，“有人认为中国对外国人不太友善”。对此，耿爽回应称，“我不知道你是怎么得出这个结论的”，并表示“你可能要进一步加深对中国的了解，恐怕要克服一下自身对中国的偏见”。戳视频↓<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4499120817945271:1034-video:1034%3A4498969603276832:page_100206_home:2803301701:4499120817945271:2803301701" title="人民视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6A2DtnM" alt="http://t.cn/A6A2DtnM" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A7%98%E9%B2%81%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%E5%A4%A7%E8%B7%B3%E6%8A%AC%E6%A3%BA%E8%88%9E%E9%AB%98%E5%96%8A%E5%9F%8B%E8%91%AC%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#秘鲁警察大跳抬棺舞高喊埋葬病毒#</a>】秘鲁因疫情严重正实行强制性居家隔离。近日，秘鲁卡哈马卡省的警察为居家隔离的民众带来街头“慰问演出”，大跳火爆的“抬棺舞”。在居民欢呼声中，“领舞”在前，6名“群舞”抬着印有“新冠病毒COVID-19”的棺材，边舞边高呼：“大家一起来战斗，来埋葬这个病毒 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFAhF2bM1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499109270521917:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499109270521917&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609496800&amp;ssig=bS9rFARioC" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4499103365140963" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFA88lzoL?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 17:41" date="1588153294000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4499103365140963:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 17:41</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B9%8C%E9%B8%A6%E7%94%A8%E7%86%8A%E7%8C%AB%E6%AF%9B%E7%BB%99%E8%87%AA%E5%B7%B1%E6%92%98%E7%AA%9D%23&amp;from=default">#乌鸦用熊猫毛给自己撘窝#</a>，网友：占国宝便宜】4月28日，一位北京网友上传“乌鸦用熊猫的毛絮窝”的视频收到网友大量点赞。视频中，一只乌鸦薅大熊猫屁股后面的毛，最后熊猫挥手赶走了乌鸦。网友：占国宝便宜！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4499103365140963:2017607-video:2017607%3A4499084896043051:page_100206_home:2803301701:4499103365140963:2803301701" title="红星视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6AyKhiZ" alt="http://t.cn/A6AyKhiZ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>红星视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【4月30日19：40，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5%E8%96%87%E5%A8%85%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民日报薇娅直播#</a>继续<a target="_blank" render="ext" 还有神秘大奖等你拿！】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 湖北好货推荐官：张艺兴<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%8A%AA%E5%8A%9B%E5%8A%AA%E5%8A%9B%E5%86%8D%E5%8A%AA%E5%8A%9Bx?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=努力努力再努力x">@努力努力再努力x</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E7%99%BD%E6%95%AC%E4%BA%AD?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=白敬亭">@白敬亭</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%A2%81%E5%BC%98?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=袁弘">@袁弘</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%AE%8B%E8%BD%B6xiaoyiyi?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=宋轶xiaoyiyi">@宋轶xiaoyiyi</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E7%8E%8B%E7%B4%AB%E7%92%87CiCi?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=王紫璇CiCi">@王紫璇CiCi</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%AD%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%8B%8B?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=魏大勋">@魏大勋</a> 为湖北复苏发声，快来看看他们推荐了什么好吃的？<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname"                                                                                                                         【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E7%BA%A7%E5%88%AB%E7%94%B1%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%A7%E9%99%8D%E4%B8%BA%E4%BA%8C%E7%BA%A7%23&amp;from=default">#河北防疫级别由一级降为二级#</a>】根据国家有关法律法规和《河北省突发公共卫生事件应急预案》，结合当前河北省新冠肺炎疫情防控形势，自2020年4月30日起，河北省突发公共卫生事件应急响应级别由一级调整为二级。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E5%BA%94%E6%80%A5%E5%93%8D%E5%BA%94%E7%BA%A7%E5%88%AB%E8%B0%83%E6%95%B4%E4%B8%BA%E4%BA%8C%E7%BA%A7%E5%93%8D%E5%BA%94%23&amp;from=default">#河北应急响应级别调整为二级响应#</a>（人民日报记者史自强） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A9%E6%B4%A5%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E7%BA%A7%E5%88%AB%E7%94%B1%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%A7%E9%99%8D%E4%B8%BA%E4%BA%8C%E7%BA%A7%23&amp;from=default">#天津防疫级别由一级降为二级#</a>】记者从刚刚召开的天津市新冠疫情防控工作新闻发布会上获悉：经天津市防控新冠肺炎领导小组批准，天津决定从4月30日零时起，将重大突发公共卫生事件应急响应级别由一级调整为二级，也就是从特别重大事件响应级别，调整为重大事件响应级别。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFzFnDsGz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499085539405063:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499085539405063&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4499084167900123" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFzDax9bl?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 16:25" date="1588148717000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4499084167900123:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 16:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%8E%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E8%BF%9B%E4%BA%AC%E6%97%A0%E9%9C%80%E5%86%8D%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB14%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#低风险地区人员进京无需再隔离14天#</a>】29日，北京市政府副秘书长陈蓓宣布，在继续对境外及国内高风险地区返京人员严格管理的基础上，对国内低风险地区进京出差、返京人员，不再要求居家隔离14天，正在隔离观察的可以解除观察，但不包括境外、湖北含武汉地区以及其他省市高中风险地区进京的人员。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFzDax9bl" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499084167900123:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499084167900123&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E7%BA%A7%E5%88%AB%E7%94%B1%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%A7%E9%99%8D%E4%B8%BA%E4%BA%8C%E7%BA%A7%23&amp;from=default">#北京防疫级别由一级降为二级#</a>】4月29日，北京市召开第96场新冠肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会。北京市政府副秘书长陈蓓宣布，自4月30日0时起，将北京重大突发公共卫生事件应急响应一级级别调整为二级。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%BA%94%E6%80%A5%E5%93%8D%E5%BA%94%E7%BA%A7%E5%88%AB%E8%B0%83%E6%95%B4%E4%B8%BA%E4%BA%8C%E7%BA%A7%E5%93%8D%E5%BA%94%23&amp;from=default">#北京应急响应级别调整为二级响应#</a><a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6AyaD2K" alt="http://t.cn/A6AyaD2K" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609496800&amp;ssig=bS9rFARioC" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4499079826730667" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFzwaseX9?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 16:08" date="1588147682000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4499079826730667:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 16:08</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E7%A7%B0%E6%88%B4%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E5%88%86%E9%A4%90%E5%B0%86%E6%88%90%E6%96%B0%E5%B8%B8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏称戴口罩分餐将成新常态#</a>】29日，复旦大学附属华山医院感染科主任张文宏表示，戴口罩、洗手、分餐、逛街都很重要，这是新常态。分餐制解决了公众一起吃饭、把口罩摘下来的时候怎么做，非常重要，给生活恢复常态化提供了“武器”。 分餐制，简单说就是筷子不要混一起，间接混一起也不行。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFzwaseX9" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499079826730667:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499079826730667&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【征集！复工复产进行时，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%99%92%E6%99%92%E4%BD%A0%E7%9A%84%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E7%89%88%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E7%85%A7%23&amp;from=default">#晒晒你的口罩版工作照#</a>】当口罩遇上职业装，有哪些动人的一线故事发生在你身边？带话题<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%AE%A9%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E8%80%85%E4%B8%8A%E5%A4%B4%E6%9D%A1%23&amp;from=default">#让劳动者上头条#</a>发条微博，晒晒你的口罩版最美工作照！欢迎通过文字、图片、视频等形式参与互动，优质内容将有机会呈现在<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;↓↓期待你的参与，这个劳动节，一起为奋斗点赞！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609496800&amp;ssig=bS9rFARioC" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4499062764491771" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFz4EiQvV?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 15:00" date="1588143613000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4499062764491771:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 15:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制4月29日15时召开新闻发布会，请<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E8%AE%B2%E8%BF%B0%E4%BA%B2%E8%BA%AB%E7%BB%8F%E5%8E%86%23&amp;from=default">#北京医院援鄂医疗队讲述亲身经历#</a>，以及与湖北的医务人员、英雄的湖北人民共同抗击疫情的故事，并回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播，一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4499062764491771:1034-video:1034%3A4499089367433252:page_100206_home:2803301701:4499062764491771:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Ayyq3o" alt="http://t.cn/A6Ayyq3o" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%AE%A9%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E8%80%85%E4%B8%8A%E5%A4%B4%E6%9D%A1%23&amp;from=default">#让劳动者上头条#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%80%E9%9A%BE%E6%8E%98%E8%BF%9B%E9%9A%A7%E9%81%93%E5%A4%A7%E6%9F%B1%E5%B1%B1%E9%9A%A7%E9%81%93%E8%B4%AF%E9%80%9A%23&amp;from=default">#最难掘进隧道大柱山隧道贯通#</a>】28日，经过12年艰难施工，大柱山隧道终于贯通。它位于云南保山境内，全长约14.5公里，穿越澜沧江深大断裂与保山褶皱带交界处，被称为“最难掘进铁路隧道”。隧道内高地温段长期温度在40摄氏度左右，每天每个挖掘面需要12吨冰块，施工人员每3小时就要 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFyXtzRcN" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499058318546005:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499058318546005&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E6%AF%8F%E5%A4%A9%E5%AE%9A%E5%87%A0%E4%B8%AA%E9%97%B9%E9%92%9F%23&amp;from=default">#你每天定几个闹钟#</a>？研究表明<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%9A%E4%B8%AA%E9%97%B9%E9%92%9F%E6%88%96%E8%87%B4%E6%85%A2%E6%80%A7%E7%96%B2%E5%8A%B3%23&amp;from=default">#设多个闹钟或致慢性疲劳#</a>】很多人怕早上起不来而设置多个闹钟，每隔5分钟响一次，殊不知这可能会导致慢性疲劳。近日，哈佛大学医学院的一项研究成果表明，若反复惊醒又睡下，人体会分泌一种名为“腺苷”的激素，使人感到疲倦、难以清醒。因此，闹钟响一次就起床更助于 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFyEDrqi1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499046636535917:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499046636535917&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%80%E9%A2%97%E5%B0%8F%E8%A1%8C%E6%98%9F%E4%BB%8A%E5%A4%A9%E5%B0%86%E4%B8%8E%E5%9C%B0%E7%90%83%E6%93%A6%E8%BA%AB%E8%80%8C%E8%BF%87%23&amp;from=default">#一颗小行星今天将与地球擦身而过#</a> 网友：是光年外的“亲密相遇”】据紫金山天文台，北京时间2020年4月29日17:56，一颗直径约2.5千米的<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%8F%E8%A1%8C%E6%98%9F52768%E5%B0%86%E9%A3%9E%E6%8E%A0%E5%9C%B0%E7%90%83%23&amp;from=default">#小行星52768将飞掠地球#</a>，与地球最近距离为628万公里，约合地月距离的16.4倍，不会对地球造成任何危害。在特定位置可通过望远镜观测这颗移动的小行星。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFyujrMYj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499040236623107:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499040236623107&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F4%E5%B2%81%E5%A5%B3%E7%AB%A5%E8%A2%AB%E8%99%90%E6%89%93%E5%85%B6%E7%88%B6%E8%A2%AB%E5%88%91%E6%8B%98%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江4岁女童被虐打其父被刑拘#</a>】日前，黑龙江建三江创业农场一名4岁女童疑被其继母虐打致重伤送医。检察机关已提前介入调查。黑龙江省垦区公安局建三江分局通报，共同生活期间，父亲于某龙对于某茜管教时，也曾用手、数据线、笤帚殴打。犯罪嫌疑人曲某某、于某龙因涉嫌故意伤害罪，已被警方刑拘。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609496822&amp;ssig=l0e5Lg9bfW" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4499024713430464" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFy5heoq4?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 12:29" date="1588134542000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4499024713430464:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 12:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【致敬每一个努力的人！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E8%80%85%E5%8D%81%E4%BA%8C%E6%97%B6%E8%BE%B0%23&amp;from=default">#劳动者十二时辰#</a>】凌晨，医务人员在急诊室中与病魔赛跑；正午，外卖小哥在烈日下飞驰；深夜，公交司机迎来最后一班乘客…在我们看得见或看不见的时空里，有千千万万的劳动者用肩膀担起责任，用双手托起幸福。画家笔下的劳动者↓↓劳动节将至，转发微博，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%AE%A9%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E8%80%85%E4%B8%8A%E5%A4%B4%E6%9D%A1%23&amp;from=default">#让劳动者上头条#</a>！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【它们不是普通的狗狗，是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%9B%B2%E4%BA%BA%E5%87%BA%E8%A1%8C%E6%97%B6%E7%9A%84%E7%9C%BC%E7%9D%9B%23&amp;from=default">#盲人出行时的眼睛#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】导盲犬是温顺聪明、训练有素的工作犬，如果你看到它，请不抚摸、不喂食、不呼唤，也不拒绝。今天，4月的最后一个星期三，国际<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AF%BC%E7%9B%B2%E7%8A%AC%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#导盲犬日#</a>，接纳导盲犬，为它们转发！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【再添一省！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%BD%E7%9C%81%E8%B4%AB%E5%9B%B0%E5%8E%BF%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E8%84%B1%E8%B4%AB%23&amp;from=default">#安徽省贫困县全部脱贫#</a>摘帽】今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%BD%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=安徽发布">@安徽发布</a> 发布消息，安徽所有贫困县全部脱贫摘帽。截至目前，我国已有河北、山西、内蒙古、吉林、黑龙江、河南、湖南、海南、重庆、西藏、陕西、青海、湖北、江西、安徽等<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2315%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E8%B4%AB%E5%9B%B0%E5%8E%BF%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E8%84%B1%E8%B4%AB%E6%91%98%E5%B8%BD%23&amp;from=default">#15省区市贫困县全部脱贫摘帽#</a>。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E5%B0%8F%E7%8F%A0%E5%B1%B1%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE%E7%B3%BB%E8%BF%9D%E8%A7%84%E7%84%8A%E6%8E%A5%E5%BC%95%E7%87%83%E6%9E%AF%E8%8D%89%23&amp;from=default">#青岛小珠山火灾系违规焊接引燃枯草#</a>所致：5人被采取强制措施】据青岛黄岛区委宣传部消息，经初步调查：4月23日14时30分许，青岛腾宇天齐工贸有限公司在黄岛区小珠山博胜苑景区进行围网安装时，因违规焊接作业引燃周围枯草，导致火灾。目前<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E5%B0%8F%E7%8F%A0%E5%B1%B1%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE5%E4%BA%BA%E8%A2%AB%E9%87%87%E5%8F%96%E5%BC%BA%E5%88%B6%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%23&amp;from=default">#青岛小珠山火灾5人被采取强制措施#</a>。该案正在进一步调查中 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFxuElQPq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4499002005207964:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4499002005207964&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609496822&amp;ssig=l0e5Lg9bfW" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498987253788524" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFx6RfTze?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-29 10:00" date="1588125610000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498987253788524:fromprofile"> 2020-4-29 10:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【定了！2020<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E4%B8%A4%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#全国两会#</a>召开时间】十三届全国人大常委会第十七次会议29日表决通过了关于十三届全国人大三次会议召开时间的决定。根据决定，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%81%E4%B8%89%E5%B1%8A%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E5%A4%A7%E4%B8%89%E6%AC%A1%E4%BC%9A%E8%AE%AE5%E6%9C%8822%E6%97%A5%E5%9C%A8%E4%BA%AC%E5%8F%AC%E5%BC%80%23&amp;from=default">#十三届全国人大三次会议5月22日在京召开#</a>。政协第十三届全国委员会第三十五次主席会议日前在京召开。会议建议全国政协十三届三次会议于5月21日在北京召开。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【谢谢你们！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%AD%E5%9D%9A%E5%AE%88%E7%9A%84%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#战疫中坚守的劳动者#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】他们，是白衣执甲的医护人员，是匆匆奔忙的快递员，是冲锋在前的警察，是为社区居民撑起守护线的社区工作者，亦是千千万万在各自岗位上贡献力量的你我...劳动节将至，感谢战疫中每个劳动者的努力和坚守。转发微博，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%AE%A9%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E8%80%85%E4%B8%8A%E5%A4%B4%E6%9D%A1%23&amp;from=default">#让劳动者上头条#</a>！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【正在直播！黄鹤归来识旧游，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%84%E9%B9%A4%E6%A5%BC%E5%BC%80%E5%9B%AD%E9%A6%96%E7%A7%80%23&amp;from=default">#黄鹤楼开园首秀#</a>】阔别98天，黄鹤归来。约你一起云游黄鹤楼，探寻战“疫”中抚慰人心的力量，共赏《武汉一定赢》小林抗疫漫画展。黄鹤楼开园首秀，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E8%80%85%E5%9C%A8%E9%BB%84%E9%B9%A4%E6%A5%BC%E6%95%B2%E9%92%9F%E7%A5%88%E7%A6%8F%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#战疫者在黄鹤楼敲钟祈福武汉#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 联合黄鹤楼景区正在直播↓↓一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498972301393643:1034-video:1034%3A4498998698901527:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498972301393643:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6A2k5ak" alt="http://t.cn/A6A2k5ak" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%84%E9%B9%A4%E6%A5%BC%E5%A5%BD%E4%B9%85%E4%B8%8D%E8%A7%81%23&amp;from=default">#黄鹤楼好久不见#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】从1月23日黄鹤楼暂停开放至今，已过去98天。作为武汉的重要地标，它经历了最孤单的黎明和黄昏，也见证了无数人为这座城市苏醒而拼命。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2380%E7%A7%92%E5%9B%9E%E9%A1%BE%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%8B%E7%9A%84%E9%BB%84%E9%B9%A4%E6%A5%BC%23&amp;from=default">#80秒回顾疫情下的黄鹤楼#</a>↓↓黄鹤楼景区今日恢复开放，冬去春来，祝福武汉，祝福中国！&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498966151983309:1034-video:1034%3A4498965446459409:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498966151983309:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6A2dSTM" alt="http://t.cn/A6A2dSTM" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <ul class="WB_media_a WB_media_a_m1 clearfix">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%8526%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增无症状感染者26例#</a>】4月28日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者26例，其中境外输入无症状感染者5例；当日转为确诊病例1例（无境外输入）；当日解除医学观察29例（境外输入4例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者993例（境外输入131例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4498960728948692"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>383</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">

                                               【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%87103%E4%B8%87%23&from=default\">#美国新冠病毒感染病例超过103万#<\/a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学发布的全球新冠肺炎数据实时统计系统，截至美国东部时间4月29日晚6时，全美共报告新冠肺炎确诊1036652例，<a 【夜读：你若温和坚定，余生皆是欢喜】善意，不是高声的叫嚣，而是一种由内而外的关怀，是一种无言的力量。柔软的人，善良而不张扬，在关怀的同时能顾忌到他人自尊，懂得给人留一份体面。这种对生命的尊重是最大的善意，更是有人情味、有温度的温暖品德。 <a                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\"
